did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Notebooks with inventories, photographs, clippings, and notes regarding United States large cents.

bioghist.head: Scope and Content Note
bioghist.p: Worthington S. Bitler (1900-1987) was a collector of United States large cents. His collection was sold to Abe Kosoff in 1960 and pieces were sold by A-Mark in 1973.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Worthington S. Bitler notebooks, mid-1900s, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Contains inventories, photographs, clippings, and notes regarding United States large cents collected by Bitler in the late 1940s and 1950s. Volumes 1 and 2 contain illustrations cut from standard catalogs and actual photographs of large cents covering the years 1793-1814; volume 3 contains over 100 photos of large cents 1815-1857 with text from sales catalogs pasted in; and volume 4 is the inventory of the original collection with cost codes and provenance.
